application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Application to approve details of condition 14 (Noise Limiter) pursuant to application 24/00883/FUL for Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary conditions 14 (Amplified Music) and 15 (External Dining) to change the wording of planning permission Ref: 22/01753/FUL for the application under section 73 to vary condition 6 on permission 14/00939/FUL to change the opening hours of the shop and caf√© to 8.00am to 10.30pm daily.  The parent permission being a proposal under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 regarding demolition of existing farm shop and associated buildings and erection of a farm shop/cafe incorporating cold store, dry store, staff room, kitchen and toilets to allow alterations to rear addition and internal alterations.
